Package MOBLIMA

Class CustomerSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • MOBLIMA.CustomerSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MOBLIMASystem
    public class CustomerSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements MOBLIMASystem
    Represents a controller system which keeps track of all the customers.
    Since:
    2019-11-13
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    SS1 Group 2

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomerSystem

        public CustomerSystem()
        Constructor for the system. It attempts to deserialize the database file. If file does not exist, it will reset the database.

        password - input password given

      • addCustomer

        public boolean addCustomer​(java.lang.String input,
                           java.lang.String customerName,
                           java.lang.String customerEmail,
                           java.lang.String customerMobileNo,
                           java.lang.String customerAge,
                           java.lang.String password)
        Adds a customer into the database.
        Parameters:
        input - customer ID of the customer
        customerName - name of the customer
        customerEmail - email of the customer
        customerMobileNo - mobile number of the customer
        customerAge - age of the customer
        password - password of the customer
        Returns:
        whether the creation of the customer is successful

      • updateCustomer

        public boolean updateCustomer​(java.lang.String input,
                              java.lang.String field,
                              java.lang.String value)
        A dynamic customer updater depending on what is to be edited in the customer.
        Parameters:
        input - customer ID of the customer
        field - what is to be edited -- this can be "name", "age", "email", "mobile number" or "password"
        value - what the value is to be updated to
        Returns:
        whether change was successful
